description: A Czech Easter fertility ritual - involving lightly whipping women - is scrapped due to coronavirus.
title: Coronavirus lockdown spares Czech women an Easter whipping
title_page: Coronavirus lockdown spares Czech women an Easter whipping - BBC News
maintext: But wherever you stand on the tradition, it's not likely to be happening much this year as Interior Minister Jan Hamacek has urged Czech men to leave their whips at home.
